name: Crazy Killer (itch)
description:
Kill those Zombie Cubes !! There are zombie cubes everywhere... you MUST kill them before they get closer to you...!!! A crazy First Person Shooter game!!

-----

W, A, S, D to move around left mouse click to shoot space to jump

-----

Im trying to improve myself in game development, I know its not that good maybe but I learned a lot while developing it :D so enjoy :D

------

Self note to become faster: developed in 6 days
